article.title: Export Awareness Workshops - South Dakota U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.short_title: Export Awareness Workshops - South Dakota USEAC
article.summary: Learn more about the export awareness workshops presented by the South Dakota U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​

"It's time for South Dakota to become a player on the world stage"
- Governor Dennis Daugaard

With 95 percent of the world's population living outside the United States, exporting is crucial for South Dakota companies to expand sales and profits. Discover International Opportunities at an upcoming Export Awareness Workshop. The series is designed to connect South Dakota companies that are new to or considering overseas sales with the resources available to begin exporting their products.


Workshop Locations & Dates

Brookings
June 23 | 12-1p.m.
Days Inn Convention Center w/lunch		Yankton
May 29 | 12-1p.m.
Minerva's w/lunch
Sioux Falls
June 3 | 7:30-8:30 a.m.
Cherapa Place w/breakfast		Watertown
June 4 | 12-1 p.m.
LATI w/lunch
Rapid City
June 17 | 12-1 p.m.
Black Hills Business Development Center
w/lunch


Workshop Registration

Click here to register for a workshop. Or paste this link into your browser:http://www.emailmeform.com/builder/form/5o6cZU7eB4GE1rb7aqdi3kj.


Questions?

Contact Rock Nelson at (605) 941-6696 or rock@siouxfalls.com​.

Reasonable accommodations for persons with disabilities will be made if requested at least two weeks in advance.​

​
